title: KyPass 1.9 – A Mac version of KeePass
content: KyPass Companion allows you to have auto-fill function in your Chrome or Firefox browser like Lastpass or 1Password with your Keepass database(s) using the keepasshttp plugins   It saves many different information (user names, passwords, urls, comments, …) in one single database. title: RoboFont 1.8.4 – The missing UFO editor
